2.9.1.25. memory_DupImmortal()

[<<<] [>>>]

This function creates a new mortal and copies the argument pVar into this new mortal. 

pFixSizeMemoryObject memory_DupImmortal(pMemoryObject pMo,
                                        pFixSizeMemoryObject pVar,
                                        int *piErrorCode
  )@{
[<<<] [>>>]
